PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by prescribing the source- deduction rules that will allow individuals to make tax-free withdrawals from their RRSP in order to participate in the new LIFELONG LEARNING PLAN or in the expanded HOME BUYERS PLAN announced in the 1998 Federal Budget.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0019 Publication Date: 1999-01-06
Attachments
precis:
Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS by prescribing the source-
deduction rules that will allow individuals to make tax-free withdrawals
from their RRSP in order to participate in the new LIFELONG LEARNING PLAN
or in the expanded HOME BUYERS PLAN announced in the 1998 Federal Budget.
